about_the_game:
Hundred of years ago, a meteorite crashed onto the surface of the planet. Its destructive impact led to a series of cataclysmic events that irrevocably damaged the world, causing the near extinction of human civilization.

Since that day, a new lifeform known as Eidolons started to appear all over the world. You have been chosen as a Summoner, part of an elite group capable of controlling the Eidolons helping maintain order in the last remaining bastion of humanity, Arcadia City.


Collect hundreds of Eidolons to be part of your team, each with its own unique set of elemental affinities and features. Drastically alter the capabilities of your team by performing Eidolon Fusion, allowing your Eidolons to to inherit features unique to other Eidolons. The possibilities are nearly endless.


Meet a variety of exciting and unique characters and fight alongside them. Join them in overcoming their own struggles, both mental and physical all while forging unbreakable bonds as you face challenges and adversity. These bonds will strengthen your resolve as a Summoner and turn them into powerful partners that will fight alongside you.


  • Collect and summon a large cast of Eidolons, each unique in its own way.
  • Tackle challenging turn-based combat that rewards strategic team building and clever decision making.
  • Experiment with extensive party customization options, designed to promote user expression without needless grinding.
  • Gather powerful allies that will fight alongside you and strengthen your skill as a Summoner.
  • Experience a thrilling post-apocalyptic story hundreds of years into the future.

name: Eidolon Awakened Demo
short_description: Eidolon Awakened is a turn-based RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world overtaken by creatures known as Eidolons. Take your place among the Summoners, able to capture and control the Eidolon to determine the fate of mankind.
